mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-17, southwest wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Counting down the hours until some end or deadline. One graffiti looks like it is being sucked into a black hole ("SAVE M~"), as the carrel walls have little holes in them. Reference to eating chicken nuggets while high on marijuana and afflicted by the munchies. "Seriously" comments on Big Sean quotation in previous entry. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
SAVE M~ | 12 more hours | Fuck | lmao | DANK NUGZ | Big Sean | Seriously?
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Marijuana
Humor
Quotations
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
